control-implementation.description: This is the control implementation for the system.

by-components.description: ACME CISO is responsible for setting the organisation access control policies, and in The access control policies at a global level are reviewed on an annual cycle. ACME CISO also review access control policy whenever ACME legal and/or Compliance teams identify access control obligations.
